title: akilANDa naayaka
sahitya:
akhilANDa nAyaka kushala vidhAyaka mAmava sadAshiva shambhO muktidAyaka

anupallavi

 nikhila subhAmbuvAsa nija bhakta vrajadAsa nigamAnta paribhAsa dhrta mrgapuravAsa

caraNam

kAraNa rUpa hara kari carmAmbaradhara kAlakandhara kAlakAla sundarEshvara 
kAruNya dhArAdhara kAmEshvara shankara kAnana tulasI vilvArcita parAtpara
